body:
```
ubuntu@aws-box:~$ echo $CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH
.../nccl/build:
ubuntu@aws-box:~$ ldconfig -p | grep libnccl
        libnccl.so.2 (libc6,x86-64) => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libnccl.so.2
        libnccl.so (libc6,x86-64) => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libnccl.so
```
